sections.heading: preclusion from receiving tax incentives or other benefits
sections.text: Participation in the Teleworker Job Creation Act shall not preclude an employer from receiving tax incentives or other benefits under other federal, state, or local incentive programs.SourceLaws 2010, LB1081, ยง 11.

48-3011.No preclusion from receiving tax incentives or other benefits.

Participation in the Teleworker Job Creation Act shall not preclude an employer from receiving tax incentives or other benefits under other federal, state, or local incentive programs.

SourceLaws 2010, LB1081, ยง 11.
